Package com.example.project_part_3.Users.Organizer_UI.Organizer_event

Class Organizer_create_edit_event_template

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.project_part_3.Users.Organizer_UI.Organizer_event.Organizer_create_edit_event_template
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
Direct Known Subclasses:
Organizer_create_event, Organizer_edit_event
public abstract class Organizer_create_edit_event_template extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
Abstract base fragment for creating or editing events in the Organizer UI. This class handles the common functionality needed to create or edit events, including initialization of UI elements, date/time selection, validation, and interaction with a shared OrganizerSharedViewModel
